= Strategy to test bearer API feature


```
sudo apt-get install composer phpunit
composer require web-token/jwt-core
composer require web-token/jwt-encryption
composer require web-token/jwt-signature
composer require web-token/jwt-encryption-algorithm-aescbc (for standard we may have to install more)
composer require web-token/jwt-encryption-algorithm-ecdh-es
composer require web-token/jwt-encryption-algorithm-rsa
composer require web-token/jwt-encryption-algorithm-pbes2
composer require web-token/jwt-signature-algorithm-hmac
```




== Log in via server and first access token
During login, the server gets a first access token for with "userinfo" scope.
This token could be used to request a bearer token for another service from SAM3.


Search for the following lines in log (debug log only, non-production) to get the "authorisation code" for the currently logged in user:
```
  "app": "user_oidc",
  "method": "GET",
  "url": "/apps/user_oidc/code?code=58475532&state=XHIEI9IQ4V4JDETSD56P7M8LWKDGKA5X",
  "message": "Received code response: {...
  \"refresh_token\":\"<this is the required refresh token for getting a magentacloud scoped access token\",\"scope\":\"userinfo\",\"token_type\":\"Bearer\" ...
  ...
```

Request an JWT bearer access token: 
```

```

Test token:

eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..FSxDYIis6xfOUKZjxm_CZMODOj66cq17Dzh9hrVm2LE


== Test Bearer token with user metadata api call:
```
curl -i -H "OCS-APIRequest: true" -H "Authorization:Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..FSxDYIis6xfOUKZjxm_CZMODOj66cq17Dzh9hrVm2LE" -X GET 'https://dev2.next.magentacloud.de/ocs/v1.php/cloud/users/120049010000000007210207/' 
```

== Complementary test:
Make API call with a "pure" NextCloud token (aquired via UI):
```
curl -i -u "120049010000000007210207:magse-Qi8Ho-jDyox-ydbxN-sHp6C" -X GET 'https://dev2.next.magentacloud.de/ocs/v1.php/cloud/users/120049010000000007210207' -H "OCS-APIRequest: true" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Accept: application/json'
```
